text:
Hi all,

Please I am trying to create a custom object record when an associate is made between a contact/company. Nothing happens when I use the company attached to the contact, nothing happens.

How can I enrol on an association event?

BR
It is hosted on HubSpot, I resolved this with external tool that allows for this

Good morning! I am not able to get a static ip address from my internet provider, too expensive, and I work remote. My ip address seems to change quite frequently. Is there anything else I can do since I am in our clients websites working quite often?

Another method for doing #1 use the `|replace()` HubL filter, to replace phrases in the modules you’re specifically using for that content. For each piece of text you want to make into a link you could replace the text with a version that has an anchor link wrapped around it.

Probably the best way though, get the content across all those pages via API. find and replace all the instances of the words in your code editor, use the pages API to update all the pages with the changes, That way the changes are in the content and don’t confuse content creators.

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report.a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.
the inline style with a variable didnt work ;9
Hello! We have a broken bit of javascript on our website and hoping a developer in this community may be able to help me in fixing it?
Hi Jenna! Can you shoot me a DM with more info pls? :slightly_smiling_face:
There’s no way to A/B test global modules, is there?
you can make global partials in HTML temaplates and then have modules be local i belive and those can be A/B tested
We're running into a pretty big issues. Anyone else having issues with serverless functions happening at the moment. This is across several portals.
Yep - us too. Completely down.
Well at least we're not crazy...

Indeed!
I've tried every workaround I can think of but just consistently getting 'server error' or 'internal server error' back on the response.

Is that what you're seeing?
The endpoints don't even register if you put in the url. But yes we're getting internall errors. one of our portals has over 1400 errors in the last 15 mins :sob:
Down Detector suggests that AWS Lambda has a partial outage, which would explain it.
Hey! Yeah there is an AWS Lambda outage <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C04A3FUK8HK/p1686685927969979>
Thanks, Danielle.
Starting to see successful responses now.
same
Hi Jenna, I am a HubSpot specialist I can help you.
